title.en: Cream Cheese Stuffed Baby Bell Pepper Appetizer
title.zh: 奶油奶酪填充嬰兒貝爾胡椒開胃

en: If you have around 45 minutes to spend in the kitchen, Cream Cheese Stuffed Baby Bell Pepper Appetizer might be an awesome gluten free, lacto ovo vegetarian, and primal recipe to try.
This recipe makes 24 servings with 43 calories, 1g of protein, and 4g of fat each.
For 24 cents per serving, this recipe covers 3% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals.
This recipe from Foodista has 82 fans.
If you have walnuts, snack peppers, green onion, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it.
It works well as a very reasonably priced side dish.
With a spoonacular score of 53%, this dish is pretty good.
Similar recipes include Cream Cheese Stuffed Baby Bell Pepper Appetizer, Cream Cheese Stuffed Baby Bell Peppers, and Cheese & Prosciutto Stuffed Baby Bell Peppers.
zh: 如果您有大約45分鐘的時間在廚房裡，那麼奶油奶酪填充的小胡椒開胃菜可能是一個很棒的麩質，乳酸乳膠素食和原始食譜可以嘗試。
該食譜將24份含43卡路里，1克蛋白質和4G脂肪的食譜。
對於每份24美分，此食譜涵蓋了您對維生素和礦物質的每日需求的3％。
來自Goodista的食譜有82位粉絲。
如果您有核桃，小吃辣椒，蔥和其他一些食材，可以做到。
它可以很好地搭配價格合理的配菜。
這道菜的孢子分數為53％，非常好。
類似的食譜包括奶油奶酪餡嬰兒甜椒開胃菜，奶油奶酪填充的小辣椒以及奶酪和熏火腿填充小胡椒。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Cut the bell peppers lengthwise, remove the seeds and stems. Lightly oil the bell peppers by tossing them in a bowl with some grapeseed oil or olive oil. Place the peppers on a baking sheet skin-side down. Roast in the oven for 8-10 minutes until the edges begin to show some color. Remove from the oven and allow to cool.
Step 2: While the peppers are roasting, prepare your stuffing. Place the cream cheese, walnuts, garlic, salt, sriracha and black pepper in a bowl and mix until creamy (I used a fork to mash the ingredients together but Im sure this can be done in a food processor or mixer). Add the green onion and fold in to the cream cheese until combined. Test the cream cheese for flavor. If you would like, add more salt and/or sriracha.
Step 3: Heat your oven to 400 degrees. Use a spoon (or a piping bag) to stuff the peppers liberally and place them back on the baking sheet. There is enough stuffing here to really pack those suckers up, so you dont need to worry about the amount of cream cheese youre portioning out. If the cream cheese is very soft, place the baking sheet in the refrigerator for 15 minutes to allow it to set up. If not, place pop the peppers in the oven and bake about 8 minutes. Change oven setting to high broil and bake an additional 2 minutes, until the tops of the cream cheese begin to brown (If theyre already brown at this point, skip the broiling).
Step 4: Put on a pretty plate and serve to your friends.
zh: 步驟1：將烤箱預熱至350度。縱向切薄片，去除種子和莖。用一些葡萄籽油或橄欖油將辣椒扔在碗中，輕輕油脂。將辣椒放在烤盤上的皮膚側。在烤箱中烤8-10分鐘，直到邊緣開始顯示一些顏色。從烤箱中取出，冷卻。
步驟2：辣椒正在烘烤時，準備餡料。將奶油奶酪，核桃，大蒜，鹽，sriracha和黑胡椒放在碗中，然後混合直至奶油（我用叉子將食材搗碎在一起，但我敢肯定可以在食品加工機或攪拌機中完成）。加入綠色洋蔥，然後將其折疊到奶油奶酪中，直至混合。測試奶油奶酪的味道。如果願意，請添加更多鹽和/或Sriracha。
步驟3：將烤箱加熱到400度。用勺子（或管道袋）將辣椒自由地塞入烤盤上。這裡有足夠的餡料來真正打包那些吸盤，因此您不必擔心奶油奶酪的數量，您會分配。如果奶油奶酪非常柔軟，請將烤盤放在冰箱中15分鐘，以使其設置。如果不是，請將辣椒彈出放入烤箱中，然後烘烤約8分鐘。將烤箱設置為高烤肉，再烘烤2分鐘，直到奶油奶酪的頂部開始變成褐色（如果此時它們已經變成褐色，請跳過烤肉）。
步驟4：放在漂亮的盤子上，給您的朋友。

title.en: Soy Ginger Glazed Halibut with Ginger Peach Relish
title.zh: 大豆姜釉大比目魚和姜桃

en: Soy Ginger Glazed Halibut with Ginger Peach Relish requires about 45 minutes from start to finish.
Watching your figure?
This gluten free, dairy free, and pescatarian recipe has 382 calories, 49g of protein, and 10g of fat per serving.
For $9.02 per serving, this recipe covers 31% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals.
This recipe serves 2.
If you have olive oil, ginger, halibut fillets, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it.
It works well as a main course.
58 people have tried and liked this recipe.
It is brought to you by Foodista.
Overall, this recipe earns an excellent spoonacular score of 93%.
Halibut with Soy-Ginger Dressing, Halibut with Pineapple Soy Ginger Sauce + a Le Creuset Giveaway, and Ginger Soy Glazed Salmon are very similar to this recipe.
zh: 大豆姜釉大比目魚和姜桃都需要從頭到尾大約45分鐘。
看著你的身影？
這種不含麩質，不含乳製品和pescatarian食譜具有382卡路里，49克蛋白質和每份脂肪的10克脂肪。
每份每份$ 9.02，此食譜涵蓋了您對維生素和礦物質的每日需求的31％。
此食譜提供2。
如果您有橄欖油，生薑，大比目魚片和其他一些食材，則可以製作。
它可以作為主課程運作良好。
有58人嘗試並喜歡這個食譜。
它是由Goodista帶給您的。
總體而言，此食譜的佔孢子分數為93％。
大比目魚配大豆醬，大比目魚配菠蘿大豆薑汁 + le Creuset贈品，以及姜醬釉鮭魚與此食譜非常相似。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Peel and roughly chop a piece of ginger. Place all marinade ingredients (soy sauce, white wine, olive oil, and 1 tablespoon chopped ginger) in a blender and blend until smooth. This step is important in order to get the ginger pulp and juices to infuse into the marinade. In a zip-lock bag (or bowl that you can cover) add the halibut fillets and marinade. Allow the fish to marinate for at least 20 minutes, but several hours is preferred if you are able to do this step ahead of time.
Step 2: Set your oven to broil, allow it to warm up then place the fish in a casserole dish with all of the marinade. Place the casserole dish on one of the top racks and allow to bake about 10-12 minutes, until there is a nice brown glaze on top and fish is cooked all the way through.
Step 3: To make the ginger peach relish, combine the chopped peach, red onion, jalapeno, apple cider vinegar, the juice of the half lime, and 1 tablespoon of ginger in a bowl, stir and refrigerate until ready to use. Allowing the relish to sit for a few hours before consuming gives the flavors time to combine.
zh: 步驟1：剝皮並大致切碎一塊生薑。將所有醃料成分（醬油，白葡萄酒，橄欖油和1湯匙切碎的生薑）放在攪拌機中，然後攪拌直至光滑。此步驟對於將生薑果肉和果汁注入醃料很重要。在拉鍊袋中（或可以蓋上的碗）中加入大比目魚和醃料。讓魚醃製至少20分鐘，但是如果您提前做這一步，則首選幾個小時。
步驟2：將烤箱設置為烤，讓其熱身，然後將魚與所有醃料一起放在砂鍋菜中。將砂鍋菜放在頂部架子之一上，烘烤約10-12分鐘，直到上面有一個漂亮的棕色釉，然後將魚類煮熟。
步驟3：要使姜桃品嚐，請將切碎的桃子，紅洋蔥，墨西哥胡椒，蘋果醋，半石灰的汁和1湯匙姜在碗中，攪拌並冷藏直至準備使用。讓福利靜置幾個小時，然後再消費，給人了混合的時間。

en: Seared Scallops With Wilted Greens is a main course that serves 4.

zh: 帶有枯萎的綠色的烤扇貝是一個服務4的主菜。
這道菜的一部分含有約19克蛋白質，18克脂肪，共271卡路里。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Slice the kale stems into thin pieces and the leaves into larger strips. Heat a large, deep pan to medium-high.
Step 2: Add the bacon a cook 3-4 minutes. Then add the shallots and cook until soft3 more minutes.
Step 3: Next add the garlic, and kale STEMS.
Step 4: Cook another 4-5 minutes before adding the leaves. Toss until wilted over the heat. Add the soy sauce, vinegar, then salt and pepper to taste. Keep warm.
Step 5: Heat an iron skillet to high. Dry the scallops thoroughly, then salt and pepper.
Step 6: Add the oil to the pan and swirl around. When it starts to smoke, quickly add the scallops.
Step 7: Cook on high for about 1-2 minutes.
Step 8: Flip the scallops and add the butter. Spoon the butter over the scallops as they cook another 1-2 minutes. Serve over warm greens.
zh: 步驟1：將羽衣甘藍莖切成薄片，將葉子切成更大的條。加熱一個大的深鍋到中高。
步驟2：加入培根3-4分鐘。然後加入蔥，煮至3分鐘。
步驟3：接下來加大蒜和羽衣甘藍莖。
步驟4：再煮4-5分鐘，然後再添加葉子。折騰直到枯萎的火力。加入醬油，醋，然後加鹽和胡椒粉調味。保持溫暖。
步驟5：將鐵煎鍋加熱到高。徹底乾燥扇貝，然后鹽和胡椒粉。
步驟6：將油加入鍋中並旋轉。當它開始吸煙時，快速添加扇貝。
步驟7：高高煮約1-2分鐘。
步驟8：翻轉扇貝，加黃油。再煮1-2分鐘時，將黃油倒在扇貝上。食用溫暖的綠色。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Oven to 375.
Step 2: Lightly pound breasts to uniform thickness ( not thin).
Step 3: Combine ingredients.
Step 4: Place chicken in baking dish.
Step 5: Spread mix evenly over chicken.
Step 6: Bake 25-30 minutes until top starts to brown.
zh: 步驟1：烤箱至375。
步驟2：輕輕磅乳房厚度均勻（不瘦）。
步驟3：組合成分。
步驟4：將雞肉放入烤盤中。
步驟5：將混合物均勻地散佈在雞肉上。
步驟6：烘烤25-30分鐘，直到頂部開始變成褐色。

zh: 巧克力皺紋餅乾可能只是您正在尋找的甜點。
該食譜提供30份，每份食譜為11美分。

instructions.en:
Step 1: In a mixing bowl, mix together vegetable oil, sugar, and vanilla extract.
Step 2: Add eggs one at a time; mix until well combined.
Step 3: Mix in the cocoa powder.
Step 4: Add the flour and baking powder; mix until smooth.
Step 5: Chill the dough for at least 4 hours in the refrigerator.
Step 6: Preheat oven to 350 F.
Step 7: Line a cookie sheet with greaseproof paper or a nonstick silicone mat.
Step 8: Scoop out a dough using an ice cream scooper and roll generously in confectioners sugar. Place on the cookie sheet each at 2 inches apart.
Step 9: Bake for 12 minutes. Let cool.
zh: 步驟1：在攪拌碗中，將植物油，糖和香草提取物混合在一起。
步驟2：一次加一個雞蛋；混合直至充分混合。
步驟3：混合可可粉。
步驟4：加入麵粉和發酵粉；混合直至光滑。
步驟5：在冰箱中將麵團至少4小時冷卻4小時。
步驟6：將烤箱預熱至350 f。
步驟7：將餅乾紙與防油紙或不粘矽膠墊子舖成。
步驟8：使用冰淇淋scoop挖出麵團，然後在糖果糖中大量滾動。將分別放在相距2英寸的曲奇紙上。
步驟9：烘烤12分鐘。讓冷卻。

這種作品的每份蛋白質具有199卡路里，2克蛋白質和17克脂肪。
每份每份92美分，該食譜涵蓋了您對維生素和礦物質的每日需求的11％。

前往商店，拿起西葫蘆，大蒜，辣椒和其他一些東西，今天就可以做。
如果您正在遵循無麩質，無乳，舊石器時代和乳酸乳酸素食，這是一個不錯的選擇。
從製備到盤子，此食譜大約需要45分鐘。

Julia Child的Ratatouille，Julia Child的Vichyssoise和Julia Child的茄子披薩與此食譜非常相似。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Peel the eggplant and cut into lengthwise slices 3/8 in thick, about 3 inches long, and 1 inch wide. Scrub the zucchini, slice off the two ends, and cut into slices about the same size as the eggplant. Place the vegetables in a bowl and toss with 1 teaspoon salt. Let stand for 30 minutes. Drain. Dry each slice in a towel.
Step 2: One layer at a time, saut the eggplant, and then the zucchini in hot olive oil for about a minute on each side to brown very lightly. Remove to a side dish.
Step 3: In the same skillet, cook the onions and peppers slowly in olive oil for about 10 minutes, or until tender but not browned. Stir in the garlic and season to taste.
Step 4: Slice the tomato pulp into 3/8-inch strips. Lay them over the onions and peppers. Season with salt and pepper. Cover the skillet and cook over low heat for 5 minutes, or until the tomatoes have begun to render their juice. Uncover, baste the tomatoes with the juices, raise heat and boil for several minutes, until juice has almost entirely evaporated.
Step 5: Place a third of the tomato mixture in the bottom of the casserole and sprinkle over it 1 tablespoon of parsley. Arrange half of the eggplant and zucchini on top, then half the remaining tomatoes and parsley. Put in the rest of the eggplant and zucchini, and finish with the remaining tomatoes and parsley.
Step 6: Cover the casserole and simmer over low heat for 10 minutes. Uncover, tip casserole and baste with the rendered juices. Correct seasoning, if necessary. Raise heat slightly and cook uncovered fro about 15 more, basting several times, until juices have evaporated leaving a spoonful or two of flavored olive oil.
Step 7: Be careful of your heat; do not let the vegetables scorch in the bottom of the casserole.
Step 8: Set aside uncovered. Reheat slowly at serving time, or serve cold.
zh: 步驟1：將茄子剝皮並切成縱向切片3/8，長約3英寸，寬1英寸。擦洗西葫蘆，切下兩端，切成與茄子大小相同的切片。將蔬菜放在碗中，然後用1茶匙鹽扔。靜置30分鐘。流走。用毛巾將每個切片乾燥。
步驟2：一次一層，炒茄子，然後在熱橄欖油中用西葫蘆在每一側持續約一分鐘，以使褐色非常輕微。取出配菜。
步驟3：在同一煎鍋中，將洋蔥和胡椒煮約10分鐘，或者直到變軟但不褐色為止。攪拌大蒜並調味。
步驟4：將番茄果肉切成3/8英寸的條。將它們放在洋蔥和辣椒上。用鹽和胡椒粉調味。蓋上煎鍋，用低火煮5分鐘，或者直到西紅柿開始榨汁為止。發現，用果汁將西紅柿炸成，加熱並煮沸幾分鐘，直到果汁幾乎完全蒸發為止。
步驟5：將三分之一的番茄混合物放在砂鍋的底部，然後撒在1湯匙的歐芹上。將一半的茄子和西葫蘆放在頂部，然後將剩餘的西紅柿和歐芹排成一半。放入其餘的茄子和西葫蘆中，並與剩下的西紅柿和歐芹結束。
步驟6：蓋上砂鍋，用低火煮10分鐘。露出果汁，發現砂鍋和肉。如有必要，正確調味。稍微升高熱量，煮熟了大約15次，炸了幾次，直到果汁蒸髮留下一湯匙或兩種風味的橄欖油為止。
步驟7：小心您的熱量；請勿讓蔬菜在砂鍋底部的灼熱。
步驟8：擱置未發現。食用時間緩慢加熱，或冷入冷。

instructions.en:
Step 1: You will need a large Dutch oven with a lid for best results. Add just enough olive oil to coat the pan and turn the heat high enough to make the oil shimmer, but not smoke.
Step 2: Pat the meat dry and dredge in flour, seasoned with kosher salt & cracked pepper.
Step 3: Add one piece of meat to the hot oil to make sure that it sizzles. Add the remaining meat, without crowding the pan and sear for about 3-4 minutes per side. You want a golden crust that will give the gravy great flavor.
Step 4: Cook the meat in batches, if necessary and set aside in a bowl-- to collect the juice.
Step 5: When all the meat is seared, turn the heat to medium and add a little more olive oil to the pan and cook the onion until tender-- 3-4 minutes. Add the sliced garlic and cook till fragrant-- 30 seconds or so.
Step 6: Add the tomato paste and paprika, and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Step 7: Add the tomato sauce, caraway seeds, lemon zest and chicken stock and stir well.
Step 8: Bring to a simmer for about 15 minutes and taste for seasoning. Adjust as necessary. If the sauce is too thick, thin with a little more chicken stock or water until it is the consistency of a gravy.
Step 9: Simmer for 2 hours, or you can use a slow cooker for 4-6 hours.
Step 10: This stew tastes even better if made one day in advance.
zh: 步驟1：您將需要一個帶有蓋子的大型荷蘭烤箱，以獲得最佳效果。僅加入足夠的橄欖油來塗上鍋，並將其變高足夠高以使油的閃爍，但不會吸煙。
步驟2：將肉乾燥和挖出麵粉，用猶太鹽和破裂的胡椒粉調味。
步驟3：將一塊肉加入熱油中，以確保它發出嘶嘶聲。加入剩餘的肉，而不會擁擠鍋，每側約3-4分鐘。您想要一種金皮，可以賦予肉汁的味道。
步驟4：如有必要，將肉煮熟，然後放在碗中 - 收集果汁。
步驟5：當所有肉被燒毀時，將熱量轉換為中等，然後在鍋中加入更多的橄欖油，然後將洋蔥煮至嫩3-4分鐘。加入切成薄片的大蒜，然後煮至香氣 -  30秒鐘左右。
第6步：加入番茄醬和辣椒粉，煮1-2分鐘。
步驟7：加入番茄醬，香菜種子，檸檬皮和雞肉湯，攪拌均勻。
第8步：煮約15分鐘，然後調味。根據需要進行調整。如果醬汁太厚，則稀薄，再加一點雞湯或水，直到肉汁的稠度為止。
步驟9：小火煮2小時，或者您可以使用慢燉鍋4-6小時。
步驟10：如果提前一天製作，這種燉菜的味道甚至更好。

instructions.en:
Step 1: In a large heavy pot set over high heat, saute ground beef and steak chunks, stirring frequently, until browned, about 8 minutes. With a slotted spoon, remove beef to a plate and pour off the remaining liquid in the pan. (I used a strainer over a large bowl, and put all the meat in it to drain the excess fat off).
Step 2: Add olive oil to the same pot that you cooked your meat in and set over medium heat. When hot, add carrots, onions, and garlic and saute, stirring, until softened, about 5 minutes. Return beef to pot, and add chili powder, cumin, oregano, salt, and chopped chipotle chile; stir and cook 1 minute. Add tomatoes and broth. Bring to a simmer, reduce heat to a gentle simmer, and cook for 30 minutes more, stirring occasionally. Much of the liquid will cook down during this time.
Step 3: Stir in all but 1/3 cup of black beans and cook 5 minutes more. Mash reserved beans with a fork, and stir into the chili to give it extra body. If chili is too thick, stir in as much as 1 cup additional broth and heat several minutes to warm. Chili can be prepared two days ahead. Cool, cover and refrigerate. Reheat over medium heat, stirring often.
Step 4: Ladle into bowls and garnish with toppings. Enjoy!
zh: 步驟1：在一個大型重鍋中，用高火，炒牛肉和牛排塊，經常攪拌，直到變成褐色約8分鐘。用開槽的勺子將牛肉取出盤子，然後倒在鍋中的剩餘液體。 （我在一個大碗上使用了一個過濾器，然後將所有肉放入其中以排除多餘的脂肪）。
步驟2：將橄欖油加入與您煮熟的鍋中，並用中火放置。熱時，加入胡蘿蔔，洋蔥，大蒜和炒，攪拌，直到變軟約5分鐘。將牛肉返回鍋，然後加入辣椒粉，小茴香，牛至，鹽和切碎的辣椒辣椒；攪拌並煮1分鐘。加入西紅柿和湯。小火煮，將熱量減少到溫和的小火煮，然後再煮30分鐘，偶爾攪拌。在這段時間裡，大部分液體會煮下來。
步驟3：除了1/3杯黑豆外，還要攪拌5分鐘。用叉子將保留的豆子搗碎，然後攪拌到辣椒中，使其額外的身體。如果辣椒太厚，請攪拌多達1杯額外的肉湯，並加熱幾分鐘的溫暖。辣椒可以提前兩天準備。冷卻，蓋子和冷藏。用中火加熱，經常攪拌。
步驟4：盛入碗中，用澆頭裝飾。享受！

instructions.en:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 425 degrees.
Step 2: Grease a loaf pan.
Step 3: In a large bowl whisk together the dry ingredients.
Step 4: Add the green chiles, cheddar, and beer.
Step 5: Stir until combined.
Step 6: Batter will be very thick.
Step 7: Scrape it out into the loaf and spread it out evenly.
Step 8: Sprinkle the seeds and salt over the top.
Step 9: Gently press them into the batter using your fingers.
Step 10: Turn oven down to 400 degrees.
Step 11: Bake for 45-50 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean from center.
Step 12: Cool on wire rack 15 minutes, turn out from pan and continue cooling while you sample!
zh: 步驟1：將烤箱預熱至425度。
步驟2：潤滑麵包盤。
步驟3：在一個大碗中攪拌干成分。
步驟4：加入綠色辣椒，切達干酪和啤酒。
步驟5：攪拌直至混合。
步驟6：麵糊將非常厚。
步驟7：將其刮入麵包中，然後將其均勻地散佈。
步驟8：將種子和鹽撒在頂部。
步驟9：用手指輕輕將它們壓入麵糊中。
步驟10：將烤箱降低到400度。
步驟11：烘烤45-50分鐘，直到牙籤從中心乾淨。
步驟12：在15分鐘內在電線架上冷卻，從鍋中滾出，然後在您採樣時繼續冷卻！

instructions.en:
Step 1: In a small bowl or ramekin, add the finely chopped shallot and cover with white wine vinegar and 1/2 teaspoon of sugar.
Step 2: Set aside and let marinate while preparing the tuna.
Step 3: Drain the tuna removing any excess water.
Step 4: In a bowl, add the tuna and with a fork; break into bite size pieces.
Step 5: Add the remaining ingredients and mix well.
Step 6: Serve on a bed of mixed salad, tossed with olive oil and red balsamic vinaigrette. The ratio for the vinaigrette is 1 part vinegar to 3 parts oil.
Step 7: Garnish with whole kalamata olives and parsley.
zh: 步驟1：在一個小碗或小動物中，加入切碎的蔥，並用白葡萄酒醋和1/2茶匙的糖覆蓋。
步驟2：放在一邊，準備金槍魚時醃製。
步驟3：排乾金槍魚，去除多餘的水。
步驟4：在碗中，加入金槍魚和叉子；分解成咬合尺寸的碎片。
步驟5：添加剩餘的成分並充分混合。
步驟6：在混合沙拉的床上食用，撒上橄欖油和紅色香醋。醋的比例為1份醋與3份油。
第7步：與整個卡拉馬塔橄欖和歐芹一起裝飾。

instructions.en:
Step 1: In a medium saucepan boil the milk until it starts to bubble gently. Remove from flame and set aside.
Step 2: Meanwhile whisk the egg yolks and sugar together for 3 minutes until pale yellow and double in volume.
Step 3: Pour the milk on to the egg mixture and stir and then gently pour the mixture back in to the saucepan and simmer very lightly. Stir continuously until the custard mix thickens or coats the back of a wooden spoon.
Step 4: Add the chopped chocolate stirring until the heat melts the chocolate.
Step 5: Cool the mixture, stir in the vanilla extract and put it in the fridge to chill.
Step 6: Once chilled, add the cream to the mixture. Stir and combine.
Step 7: Pour the mixture into an ice cream machine and churn until frozen.
Step 8: Add dried cranberries in the last 5 minutes of churning and let the machine stir them in.
Step 9: Transfer to plastic container and place in the freezer for 3 hours before serving.
zh: 步驟1：在中鍋中，將牛奶煮沸，直到開始輕輕起泡。從火焰中取出並放在一旁。
步驟2：同時將蛋黃和糖一起攪拌3分鐘，直到淺黃色和音量兩倍。
步驟3：將牛奶倒入雞蛋混合物中，然後攪拌，然後將混合物輕輕地倒入鍋中，然後輕輕煮。連續攪拌，直到蛋ust混合變稠或塗在木勺的背面。
步驟4：加入切碎的巧克力，直到熱量融化巧克力。
步驟5：冷卻混合物，加入香草提取物，然後將其放入冰箱中冷卻。
步驟6：冷藏後，將奶油加入混合物中。攪拌並組合。
步驟7：將混合物倒入冰淇淋機中，然後攪拌直至冷凍。
步驟8：在攪拌的最後5分鐘內加入乾蔓越莓，然後讓機器攪拌。
步驟9：轉移到塑料容器中，然後在冰箱中放置3個小時，然後再上菜。

zh: 野生鮭魚蛋糕可能只是您正在尋找的主菜。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Mince the salmon.
Step 2: In a bowl, whip the egg; add the diced onion, capers and salmon until ingredients are incorporated Add the panko bread crumbs until combined.
Step 3: Form into 4 patties and place on a hot grill for about 2-3 minutes on each side, or in a 350 degree oven for 15-20 minutes.
zh: 步驟1：切鮭魚。
步驟2：在碗中，鞭打雞蛋；加入切成丁的洋蔥，刺山柑和鮭魚，直到成分合併，然後加入panko麵包麵包屑，直至混合。
步驟3：形成4個小餡餅，並在熱烤架上放置約2-3分鐘，在350度烤箱中持續15-20分鐘。

title.zh: 草莓 - 山戈藜麥沙拉

en: Need a gluten free and lacto ovo vegetarian hor d'oeuvre?
Strawberry-Mango Quinoa Salad could be an awesome recipe to try.
This recipe serves 4.
One serving contains 354 calories, 8g of protein, and 17g of fat.
For $1.87 per serving, this recipe covers 21% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals.
41 person were impressed by this recipe.
This recipe from Foodista requires cucumber, cream, mango, and strawberries.
From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 45 minutes.
All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 97%.
This score is tremendous.
Similar recipes are Strawberry-Mango Quinoa Salad, Strawberry-Mango Quinoa Salad, and Strawberry & Mango Chopped Spinach Quinoa Salad with Sesame-Lime Vinaigrette.
zh: 需要無麩質和乳糖素素食主義者嗎？
草莓 - 山戈藜麥沙拉可能是一個很棒的食譜。
此食譜提供4。
一份含有354卡路里，8克蛋白質和17克脂肪。
每份1.87美元，此食譜涵蓋了您對維生素和礦物質的每日需求的21％。
這個食譜給41人留下了深刻的印象。
來自Goodista的食譜需要黃瓜，奶油，芒果和草莓。
從準備到盤子，此食譜大約需要45分鐘。
考慮到所有因素，我們認為這個食譜應得分97％。
這個分數是巨大的。
類似的食譜是草莓 - 山戈藜麥沙拉，草莓 - 山戈藜麥沙拉，草莓和芒果切碎的菠菜藜麥沙拉，芝麻檸檬醋。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Prepare the quinoa: In a medium saucepan combine the quinoa, water and 1/4 t. salt. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover and simmer until the liquid is just absorbed, about 15 minutes. Spread the cooked quinoa out on a baking sheet to cool for about 20 minutes.
Step 2: In a large bowl whisk together lime juice, zest, honey, sour cream and olive oil. Add the cooled quinoa, strawberries, mango, cucumber and mint. Toss well to combine and season with salt & pepper. Serve immediately.
zh: 步驟1：準備藜麥：在中等鍋中，將藜麥，水和1/4 t結合在一起。鹽。煮沸，將熱量降低至低，蓋上煮熟，直到液體吸收約15分鐘。將煮熟的藜麥撒在烤盤上，冷卻約20分鐘。
步驟2：在一個大碗中，將酸橙汁，皮，蜂蜜，酸奶油和橄欖油一起攪拌。加入冷卻的藜麥，草莓，芒果，黃瓜和薄荷。很好地折騰，與鹽和胡椒粉結合併調味。立即服務。

en: The recipe Veal Piccatas can be made in around 45 minutes.
For 73 cents per serving, this recipe covers 6% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals.
One portion of this dish contains roughly 2g of protein, 13g of fat, and a total of 160 calories.
This recipe serves 4.
It works well as a hor d'oeuvre.
Head to the store and pick up veal scaloppine, capers, parsley, and a few other things to make it today.
Only a few people made this recipe, and 4 would say it hit the spot.
It is brought to you by Foodista.
With a spoonacular score of 11%, this dish is not so super.
If you like this recipe, take a look at these similar recipes: Veal Giuseppe, Veal Scallopini, and Veal Saltimbocca.
zh: 食譜小牛肉皮卡塔斯可以在大約45分鐘內製成。
每份每份73美分，該食譜涵蓋了您對維生素和礦物質的日常需求的6％。
這道菜的一部分包含大約2g蛋白質，13克脂肪和160卡路里的卡路里。
此食譜提供4。
它可以像hor d'eeuvre一樣工作。
前往商店，拿起小牛肉鱗，刺山柑，歐芹以及其他一些事情。
只有少數人製作了這個食譜，4會說它遇到了現場。
它是由Goodista帶給您的。
這道菜的勺子得分為11％，這盤並不那麼超級。
如果您喜歡此食譜，請看一下這些類似的食譜：小牛肉朱塞佩，小牛肉扇貝和小牛肉鹽豆果。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Season veal scaloppine with salt and pepper, then dust with flour.
Step 2: In a skillet add the butter and the vegetable oil, and heat over medium-high.
Step 3: Saut the scaloppine 2-3 minutes on one side.
Step 4: Flip the scaloppine over and saut the other side 1-2 minutes with the pan covered.
Step 5: Transfer the scaloppine to a warmed platter; pour off the fat from the pan.
Step 6: Deglaze pan with wine and add minced garlic.
Step 7: Cook until garlic is slightly brown and liquid is nearly evaporated, about 2 minutes.
Step 8: Add broth, lemon juice and capers.
Step 9: Return veal scaloppine to pan and cook on each side for 1 minute.
Step 10: Transfer to a warm plates.
Step 11: Finish sauce with butter and lemons.
Step 12: Once butter melts, pour sauce over veal.
Step 13: Garnish with chopped fresh parsley and serve.
zh: 步驟1：用鹽和胡椒粉調味小牛肉鱗片，然後用麵粉粉塵。
步驟2：在煎鍋中加入黃油和植物油，然後在中高。
步驟3：一側炒2-3分鐘的鱗片。
步驟4：將鱗片上的鱗片翻轉，然後將另一側炒1-2分鐘，鍋蓋覆蓋。
步驟5：將鱗片轉移到溫暖的盤子中；從鍋中倒出脂肪。
步驟6：與酒的脫落鍋，加入碎大蒜。
步驟7：煮至大蒜略微棕色，液體幾乎蒸發，大約2分鐘。
步驟8：加入湯，檸檬汁和刺山柑。
步驟9：將小牛肉鱗片返回鍋鍋並在每一側煮1分鐘。
步驟10：轉移到溫暖的盤子上。
步驟11：用黃油和檸檬完成醬汁。
步驟12：黃油融化後，將醬汁倒在小牛肉上。
步驟13：用切碎的新鮮歐芹裝飾並食用。

en: Forget going out to eat or ordering takeout every time you crave Cajun food.
Try making Jean's Seafood Gumbo at home.
One serving contains 524 calories, 68g of protein, and 19g of fat.
This recipe serves 9 and costs $5.32 per serving.
6 people were impressed by this recipe.
This recipe from Foodista requires thyme, salt, tomato paste, and peppers.
It works well as a pricey main course.
From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes.
It is a good option if you're following a dairy free diet.
With a spoonacular score of 87%, this dish is tremendous.
Users who liked this recipe also liked Jean's Seafood Gumbo, Seafood Gumbo, and Seafood Gumbo.
zh: 每次您渴望Cajun食物時，請忘記外出吃飯或訂購外賣。
嘗試在家中讓Jean的海鮮濃湯。
一份含有524卡路里，68克蛋白質和19克脂肪。
該食譜提供9，每份$ 5.32。
這個食譜給6個人留下了深刻的印象。
來自Goodista的食譜需要百里香，鹽，番茄醬和辣椒。
它的運行良好，是一個昂貴的主課程。
從準備到盤子，此食譜大約需要45分鐘。
如果您遵循無乳製品飲食，這是一個不錯的選擇。
這道菜的勺子得分為87％，因此很大。
喜歡此食譜的用戶還喜歡讓​​的海鮮濃湯，海鮮濃湯和海鮮濃湯。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Fill a 14-16-quart pot with two quarts of water and bring to a boil.
Step 2: Meanwhile, peel and devein the shrimp, keeping the heads and hulls.
Step 3: Set the shrimp aside in cold water.
Step 4: In the large "gumbo pot" boil heads and hulls for 30 minutes to an hour.
Step 5: This will give you Creole gumbo.
Step 6: Strain shrimp heads and hulls from stock and set aside.
Step 7: Discard heads and hull immediately.
Step 8: Otherwise, the next day your kitchen will smell like Bayou St.
Step 9: John.
Step 10: Clean the fresh crabs If the crabs are fresh, you must take time to clean them.
Step 11: Discard the hard back shell and some of the so-called "dead man," or yellow insides.
Step 12: Clean and separate crabs and set aside.
Step 13: (Note: If necessary, you can use meat from king, Dungeness, snow or stone crabs for your gumbo).
Step 14: Before you fire up the stove again, cut up your celery, parsley, peppers, onions and garlic, especially if you're alone and there is no one to help you stir the pots.
Step 15: It takes time peeling the onions and garlic Put the celery and parsley in a separate container from the other chopped ingredients and refrigerate until needed to keep them fresh.
Step 16: Place the gumbo pot with the shrimp stock on the stove.
Step 17: Add cleaned crabs and bay leaves.
Step 18: Stir slowly.
Step 19: You don't want your shrimp stock messing up the floor.
Step 20: Add celery, parsley, and tomato paste to the gumbo brewing on the stove.
Step 21: Bring to a boil.
Step 22: Turn down heat, cover, and let simmer.
Step 23: Here comes the roux -- a thick and flavorful sauce that has become one of the most important staples of Louisiana cuisine.
Step 24: Pour oil or shortening into a separate heavy skillet (please do not use a thin omelet pan) over a medium-low heat.
Step 25: Slowly stir in flour to make the roux.
Step 26: Keep your eyes on the skillet.
Step 27: If the phone rings, let the answering machine pick it up.
Step 28: Cook roux until it has a dark mahogany color.
Step 29: Do not stop stirring until roux appears nutty or grainy.
Step 30: If black specks appear, the roux is burned.
Step 31: Throw it out and start from scratch.
Step 32: A good roux could take 30 to 45 minutes cooking time.
Step 33: Now you are ready to add the holy trinity of onions, garlic, and green peppers to the roux mixture.
Step 34: Stir ingredients in slowly because the flour is still sizzling.
Step 35: The moisture will begin to disappear.
Step 36: This is when Jean would add another quart or two of water to the gumbo pot.
Step 37: Add roux to the gumbo pot.
Step 38: Bring to a boil, stirring constantly.
Step 39: Lower heat and cover.
Step 40: The kitchen should smell good right now.
Step 41: Pour yourself another cold something-or-other.
Step 42: You're halfway there.
Step 43: Come back to look and stir in an hour or so.
Step 44: Season to taste: add salt, pepper, thyme, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco sauce and any Creole seasoning you like.
Step 45: Don't overdo it right now.
Step 46: Let the roux work its magic absorbing all the wonderful ingredients.
Step 47: Gumbo is usually very spicy, but you can keep it mild.
Step 48: Remember, if you have decided to use andouille sausage it is also hot.
Step 49: Fry sausages and okra with a little bit of the leftover grease.
Step 50: Sprinkle a little leftover flour if the okra is fresh.
Step 51: Add to gumbo pot.
Step 52: Add chopped peeled tomatoes, stirring until well blended.
Step 53: Add more water if necessary.
Step 54: The roux will keep it thick and tasty.
Step 55: Return to a boil and simmer for 10 minutes.
Step 56: Reduce heat and let simmer, uncovered, for 2 1/2 to 3 hours over low heat.
Step 57: Skim any excess fat.
Step 58: Add shrimp.
Step 59: Stir in slowly as you increase the heat one last time.
Step 60: It's time to stir in the fil powder.
Step 61: Cook another 20 to 30 minutes until the gumbo is thick.
Step 62: Taste and adjust seasonings one more time.
Step 63: Did I mention the rice?
Step 64: Seafood gumbo is served over Louisiana rice.
Step 65: Of course, you can substitute for your own favorite rice.
Step 66: Just plain old brown or white rice will do.
Step 67: Before serving, taste one more time and adjust seasoning.
Step 68: Turn off heat and remove seafood gumbo from the stove.
Step 69: To cool down the pot before serving, place it in the sink with a few inches of ice-cold water.
Step 70: If needed, add additional salt and Tabasco sauce.
Step 71: If you can see through the gumbo to the bottom of the pot, work on your roux next time.
zh: 步驟1：用兩夸脫的水填充14-16夸脫的鍋，煮沸。
步驟2：與此同時，將蝦剝皮和devein，保持頭部和船體。
步驟3：將蝦放在冷水中。
步驟4：在大的“ Gumbo Pot”中，沸騰的頭和船體30分鐘到一個小時。
步驟5：這將為您提供Creole Gumbo。
步驟6：將蝦頭和船體從庫存中伸出，放在一旁。
步驟7：立即丟棄頭部和船體。
第8步：否則，第二天，您的廚房會聞起來像Bayou St.
步驟9：約翰。
步驟10：清潔新鮮的蟹，如果螃蟹是新鮮的，則必須花時間清潔它們。
步驟11：丟棄硬背殼和一些所謂的“死人”或黃色內部。
步驟12：清潔和分開的螃蟹，放在一旁。
步驟13 ：（請注意：必要時，您可以將國王，dugneness，Snow或Stone Crabs的肉用於濃湯）。
步驟14：在再次發射爐子之前，請切成芹菜，歐芹，辣椒，洋蔥和大蒜，尤其是如果您一個人，沒有人可以幫助您攪拌鍋。
步驟15：將洋蔥和大蒜剝離，將芹菜和歐芹與其他切碎的成分放在一個單獨的容器中，然後冷藏直到需要使它們保持新鮮。
步驟16：將帶有蝦湯的Gumbo鍋放在爐子上。
步驟17：添加清潔的螃蟹和月桂葉。
步驟18：慢慢攪拌。
步驟19：您不希望蝦湯弄亂地板。
步驟20：將芹菜，歐芹和番茄醬加入爐子上的濃湯中。
步驟21：燒開。
步驟22：調低熱量，蓋上蓋子，然後煮沸。
步驟23：魯克斯（Roux）是一種濃郁可口的調味料，已成為路易斯安那州美食的最重要的主食之一。
步驟24：將油或縮短到單獨的重煎鍋中（請不要使用薄煎蛋鍋），在中低火上。
步驟25：慢慢攪拌麵粉以製成roux。
步驟26：請注意煎鍋。
步驟27：如果電話響了，請讓答錄機撿起它。
步驟28：煮魯克斯，直到它具有深色的紅木顏色。
步驟29：不要停止攪拌，直到roux顯得堅果或顆粒狀。
步驟30：如果出現黑色斑點，則將肉體燃燒。
步驟31：將其扔出去並從頭開始。
步驟32：一個好的魯克斯可能需要30到45分鐘的烹飪時間。
步驟33：現在，您準備將洋蔥，大蒜和綠辣椒的三位一體添加到roux混合物中。
步驟34：由於麵粉仍在嘶啞而緩慢攪拌成分。
步驟35：水分將開始消失。
步驟36：這是Jean將另一夸脫的水或兩夸脫的水中加到濃湯鍋中的時候。
步驟37：將roux添加到Gumbo鍋中。
步驟38：燒開，不斷攪拌。
步驟39：降低熱量和蓋子。
步驟40：廚房現在應該聞起來很好。
步驟41：將自己倒入另一個寒冷的東西。
步驟42：您在那裡。
步驟43：回去看一看並攪拌一個小時左右。
步驟44：調味：加入鹽，胡椒粉，百里香，伍斯特郡醬，塔巴斯科醬和任何您喜歡的克里奧爾醬。
步驟45：不要立即過度。
步驟46：讓魯克斯的魔力吸收所有精彩的成分。
步驟47：Gumbo通常非常辣，但是您可以保持溫和。
步驟48：請記住，如果您決定使用Andouille香腸，那也很熱。
步驟49：炸香腸和秋葵，剩下的油脂。
步驟50：如果秋葵新鮮，則撒上剩下的剩餘麵粉。
步驟51：添加到Gumbo鍋中。
步驟52：加入切碎的剝皮西紅柿，攪拌直至充分混合。
步驟53：如有必要，請添加更多水。
步驟54：roux會保持濃稠和美味。
步驟55：煮沸，小火煮10分鐘。
步驟56：減少熱量，然後用低火煮2 1/2至3小時。
步驟57：瀏覽多餘的脂肪。
步驟58：添加蝦。
步驟59：最後一次增加熱量時慢慢攪拌。
步驟60：是時候加入FIL粉。
步驟61：再煮20到30分鐘，直到濃湯厚。
步驟62：再次調味並調整調味料。
步驟63：我是否提到了米飯？
步驟64：海鮮濃湯是在路易斯安那州米飯上供應的。
步驟65：當然，您可以代替自己喜歡的米飯。
步驟66：只有普通的舊棕色或白米飯就可以做到。
步驟67：在食用之前，再品嚐一次，並調整調味料。
步驟68：關閉熱量並從爐子上取出海鮮濃湯。
步驟69：要在食用前冷卻鍋，請將其放入水槽中，用幾英寸的冰冷的水放在水槽中。
步驟70：如果需要，請添加其他鹽和塔巴斯科醬。
步驟71：如果您可以通過濃湯透過鍋底，請下次在roux上工作。

title.en: Easy Instant Pot Beef Tips and Rice

en: Easy Instant Pot Beef Tips and Rice takes around 30 minutes from beginning to end.
Watching your figure?
This gluten free and dairy free recipe has 371 calories, 53g of protein, and 11g of fat per serving.
This recipe serves 4 and costs $2.2 per serving.
25 people have made this recipe and would make it again.
Head to the store and pick up dale's seasoning sauce, onion, olive oil, and a few other things to make it today.
It works well as a main course.
It is brought to you by Pink When.
Overall, this recipe earns a super spoonacular score of 93%.
Users who liked this recipe also liked Instant Pot Beef Tips, Instant Pot Beef Tips, and Instant Pot Red Wine Beef Tips.
zh: 從頭到尾，簡單的速溶鍋牛肉技巧和大米大約需要30分鐘。
看著你的身影？
這種無麩質和無乳製品配方具有371卡路里，53克蛋白質和每份脂肪11克。
該食譜提供4，每份$ 2.2。
有25個人製作了這個食譜，並將再次製作。
前往商店，拿起戴爾（Dale）的調味醬，洋蔥，橄欖油以及今天做的其他一些東西。
它可以作為主課程運作良好。

總體而言，此食譜的超級小孢子分數為93％。
喜歡此食譜的用戶還喜歡Instant Pot Beef Tips，Instant Pot Beef Tips和Instant Pot Red Wine Beef Tips。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Set Instant Pot to the saute setting.
Step 2: Once warm, add olive oil, beef tips, and onion.
Step 3: Stir and saut for 5 minutes or until meat starts to brown.
Step 4: Add water, Dales, and cream of mushroom soup, and garlic powder.
Step 5: Stir to mix well, and then cover with lid.
Step 6: Cook on Manual Setting on High Pressure for 25 minutes.
Step 7: It will take a few minutes to come to pressure.
Step 8: Once done, allow to naturally release for 20 minutes.
Step 9: Serve over rice (or sub noodles or mashed potatoes) and serve with french bread to sop up the gravy.
zh: 步驟1：將Instant Pot設置為炒鍋設置。
步驟2：溫暖後，加入橄欖油，牛肉尖和洋蔥。
步驟3：攪拌並炒5分鐘，或直到肉開始變成褐色。
步驟4：加水，奶油和蘑菇湯和大蒜粉。
步驟5：攪拌均勻，然後用蓋子蓋住。
步驟6：在高壓下手動設置上煮25分鐘。
步驟7：壓力需要幾分鐘。
步驟8：完成後，允許自然釋放20分鐘。
步驟9：搭配米飯（或子麵或土豆泥），並與法國麵包一起食用肉汁。

One portion of this dish contains about 2g of protein, 1g of fat, and a total of 24 calories.
This recipe from Foodista has 7 fans.
If you have salt and pepper, garam masala, tomatoes, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it.

Step 3: When ready to serve, remove from the freezer and set on the container for 10 minutes. Then use your spoon to shave away!
Step 4: Make a little over 3 cups, or 6 individual servings.

instructions.en:
Step 1: Cook Italian sausage in a medium skillet until browned.
Step 2: Drain on paper towels and crumble into small pieces.Heat oven to 450 degrees.Place parchment paper on a baking pan and lightly flour.
Step 3: Roll dough out to form a large rectangle.Brush a thin layer of pizza sauce on dough.
Step 4: Layer on crumbled sausage then mozzarella cheese.Place pepperoni slices on top of cheese then sprinkle with 3/4 cup Parmesan cheese.Gently roll in short sides of dough to form a seal around filling.Starting on long side of dough, carefully roll into one third of Stromboli.
Step 5: Using parchment, roll dough again until reaching opposite end.
Step 6: Pinch together and place seam side down.Mix egg with 1 tablespoon of water.
Step 7: Brush egg mixture over Stromboli and sprinkle with remaining 1/4 Parmesan cheese.Place in oven and IMMEDIATELY TURN OVEN DOWN to 350 degrees.Bake for approximately 18 minutes.
Step 8: Remove from oven and let rest for 10 minutes.
Step 9: Test center of turnover.
Step 10: If dough is not completely cooked, slice Stromboli in half and bake for additional 5-8 minutes.Serve with warm pizza sauce
zh: 步驟1：在中等煎鍋中煮意大利香腸，直到變成褐色。
步驟2：在紙巾上瀝乾碎片，將其碎成小塊。加熱至450度。將羊皮紙放在烤盤上，然後輕輕地麵粉。
步驟3：滾出麵團以形成一個大矩形。刷子上的一層薄薄的披薩醬。
步驟4：將碎香腸放在碎奶酪上。將意大利辣香腸切成薄片放在奶酪頂部，然後撒上3/4杯帕爾馬干酪奶酪。在麵團的短側面滾動，在麵團填充周圍形成密封。在麵團的長側開始，小心地滾入stromboli的三分之一。
步驟5：使用羊皮紙，再次滾動麵團直至到達對面。
步驟6：將接縫側捏在一起。將雞蛋與1湯匙水。
步驟7：將雞蛋混合物刷在stromboli上，並撒上剩餘的1/4帕爾瑪奶酪。放在烤箱中，立即將烤箱倒入350度。烤麵包約18分鐘。
步驟8：從烤箱中取出，靜置10分鐘。
步驟9：營業額的測試中心。
步驟10：如果麵團不完全煮熟，請將stromboli切成兩半，再烘烤5-8分鐘。

Step 5: Pop it into a container and set it in the fridge to cool completely.
zh: 步驟1：將蛋黃和糖加到攪拌機中。將其鞭打好，直到混合物變成淺黃色。
步驟2：現在，抓住您的小鍋，將牛奶，濃奶油，五香粉，肉荳蔻和肉桂加入其中。
步驟3：將其加熱到沸騰並將其從火上取出。抓住大約半杯熱牛奶，將其加入雞蛋混合物中，不斷攪拌。現在，將鋼化雞蛋混合物添加到其餘的牛奶混合物中，繼續不斷攪拌。
步驟4：將混合物放回中火上，然後將其煮至沸騰並變稠。
步驟5：將其彈出到容器中，然後將其設置在冰箱中以完全冷卻。

title.en: Mussels & Clams in White Wine {Cozze e Vongole}
title.zh: 白葡萄酒中的貽貝和蛤s {貽貝和蛤s}

en: Mussels & Clams in White Wine {Cozze e Vongole} is a gluten free, dairy free, paleolithic, and lacto ovo vegetarian hor d'oeuvre.
This recipe serves 4.
For $2.46 per serving, this recipe covers 11% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals.
One serving contains 115 calories, 2g of protein, and 4g of fat.
Head to the store and pick up garlic, salt, parsley, and a few other things to make it today.
36 people were impressed by this recipe.
From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 45 minutes.
It is brought to you by Foodista.
Taking all factors into account, this recipe earns a spoonacular score of 74%, which is solid.
Users who liked this recipe also liked Mussels And Clams In White Wine, Smoky Mussels and Clams with White Wine Broth, and Fish, Clams, and Mussels with White Wine and Garlic.
zh: 白葡萄酒中的貽貝和蛤s是無麩質，不含乳製品，舊石器時代和乳酸素食主義者。
此食譜提供4。
每份2.46美元，此食譜涵蓋了您對維生素和礦物質的每日需求的11％。
一份含115卡路里，2g蛋白質和4g脂肪。
前往商店，拿起大蒜，鹽，歐芹以及其他一些東西來做。
這個食譜給36人留下了深刻的印象。
從準備到盤子，此食譜大約需要45分鐘。
它是由Goodista帶給您的。
考慮到所有因素，該食譜的勺子得分為74％，這是堅實的。
喜歡這種食譜的用戶還喜歡白葡萄酒，煙熏貽貝和蛤lam和白葡萄酒湯，魚，蛤和貽貝的貽貝和蛤lam。

instructions.en:
Step 1: In a large frying pan on low heat add 3-4 glugs of olive oil and slowly cook the garlic until brown all over. Remove & discard the garlic (if you like it, leave it in.)
Step 2: Turn the heat up, add in chili flakes & clams - cook about 30 seconds to 1 minute. Then add in the mussels. Turn up the heat and toss in the cherry tomatoes, sauteing for a moment or two.
Step 3: Next add a half glass of white wine and cover. Allow to sit covered 1-2 minutes at most until the shells open. Then shut off the heat, add in your parsley. Finish with a bit of butter or good glug of olive oil. Top with arugula if you like.
Step 4: Serve immediately with plenty of good crunchy bread to dip & white wine wine.
zh: 步驟1：在低溫下的大煎鍋中，加入3-4個糖油，然後慢慢煮大蒜，直至變成褐色。取出並丟棄大蒜（如果您喜歡的話，將其放入。）
步驟2：調高熱量，加入辣椒片和蛤s-煮約30秒至1分鐘。然後加入貽貝。在櫻桃番茄中加熱並折騰，炒一兩分。
步驟3：接下來加一杯白葡萄酒和蓋子。最多讓1-2分鐘蓋住蓋子，直到殼打開。然後關閉熱量，加入歐芹。結束一些黃油或良好的橄欖油。如果願意，請與芝麻菜。
步驟4：立即用大量脆脆的麵包浸入蘸醬和白葡萄酒。

en: Crumbled Feta Couscous Salad is a lacto ovo vegetarian hor d'oeuvre.
This recipe serves 8 and costs 76 cents per serving.
One serving contains 160 calories, 5g of protein, and 7g of fat.
If you have roma tomato, salt, feta cheese, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it.
2 people found this recipe to be scrumptious and satisfying.

zh: 皺巴巴的羊乳酪沙拉是一種乳酸素食主義者。
該食譜提供8份，每份食譜為76美分。
一份含有160卡路里，5克蛋白質和7克脂肪。
如果您有羅馬番茄，鹽，羊奶酪和其他一些食材，可以做到。
2個人發現​​這個食譜令人著迷和令人滿意。
它是由Goodista帶給您的。
從製備到盤子，此食譜大約需要45分鐘。
考慮到所有因素，該食譜的勺子得分為32％，這是相當糟糕的。
類似的食譜包括希臘西葫蘆沙拉和皺紋的羊乳酪，蘆筍和小扁豆沙拉和蔓越莓和皺巴巴的羊乳酪，以及阿拉斯加熏制的鮭魚尼古斯·尼科·尼科·尼科·尼科·尼古特·沙拉（Nicoise Saland），鮮美的羊乳酪。

instructions.en:
Step 1: In a medium sauce pan bring water or vegetable stock to a boil then add couscous stirring quickly.
Step 2: Remove from the heat and cover, let stand for 4-5 minutes.
Step 3: Remove the lid and stir in the olive oil.
Step 4: Pour cooked couscous in a large bowl to chill, stir occasionally.
Step 5: When cooled stir in remaining ingredients and chill completely.
zh: 步驟1：在中醬中，將水或蔬菜湯煮沸，然後迅速加入蒸粗麥粉。
步驟2：從火上取出並蓋上蓋子，靜置4-5分鐘。
步驟3：取下蓋子，攪拌入橄欖油。
步驟4：將煮熟的蒸粗麥粉倒入一個大碗中以冷卻，偶爾攪拌。
步驟5：冷卻時攪拌剩餘的成分並完全冷卻。

title.en: Vanilla Bean Melting Moment Cookies With Caramel Filling
title.zh: 香草豆融化時刻餅乾與焦糖填充

en: Vanilla Bean Melting Moment Cookies With Caramel Filling might be a good recipe to expand your dessert repertoire.
This lacto ovo vegetarian recipe serves 10 and costs 65 cents per serving.
One portion of this dish contains roughly 5g of protein, 25g of fat, and a total of 408 calories.
Not a lot of people made this recipe, and 8 would say it hit the spot.
This recipe from Foodista requires cornstarch, butter, vanilla bean paste, and golden syrup.
From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes.
With a spoonacular score of 19%, this dish is not so super.

Similar recipes include Vanilla Melting Moments Sandwich Cookies with Nutella-Cream Cheese Filling, Vanilla Bean Cake with Raspberry Filling and Whipped Vanilla Bean Frosting {Octopus Birthday Cake}, and Orange Walnut Macarons with Spiced Cream Cheese and Cranberry Filling {Guest Post by Baking A Moment}.
zh: 香草豆融化時刻的餅乾和焦糖餡料可能是擴大甜點曲目的好秘訣。
這款乳酸元素素食食譜可提供10份，每份含量為65美分。
這道菜的一部分含有大約5克蛋白質，25克脂肪和408卡路里。
沒有很多人製作這個食譜，8會說它成為現場。
這個來自Goodista的食譜需要玉米澱粉，黃油，香草豆醬和金糖漿。
從製備到盤子，此食譜大約需要45分鐘。
這道菜的孢子分數為19％，並不那麼超級。
類似的食譜包括帶有花生奶酪奶酪餡料的香草融化時刻三明治餅乾，帶有覆盆子餡料的香草豆蛋糕和鮮味的香草豆糖霜{章魚生日蛋糕}以及橙胡桃木馬卡龍，帶有香料的奶油奶酪和蔓越莓奶酪和蔓越莓填充{客客餡料}。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees Place the butter, powdered sugar and vanilla in a bowl and beat with an electric mixer until light and fluffy.
Step 2: Stir in the sifted flour and cornstarch until combined.
Step 3: Place the mixture in a piping bag fitted with a fluted tip.
Step 4: Pipe 1in rounds onto a baking sheet linded with parchment paper, allowing room to spread.
Step 5: Bake for 12 - 14 minutes or until golden.
Step 6: Cool on a tray (not on a rack, that will make it hard to pick up the delicate cookie).
Step 7: Place all ingredients in a sauce pan and turn on very low heat.
Step 8: Stir for 25-30 minutes or until thick and pale golden.
Step 9: Allow to cool.
Step 10: Eat with a big spoon.
zh: 步驟1：將烤箱預熱至350度，將黃油，糖粉和香草放入碗中，然後用電動攪拌機攪拌直至輕巧蓬鬆。
步驟2：攪拌篩分的麵粉和玉米澱粉，直至混合。
步驟3：將混合物放在裝有凹槽尖端的管道袋中。
步驟4：將1英寸的圓形管道上的烤盤上鋪滿羊皮紙，使房間散開。
步驟5：烘烤12-14分鐘或直到黃金。
步驟6：在托盤上冷卻（不在架子上，這將使很難拿起精緻的餅乾）。
步驟7：將所有成分放在醬汁鍋中，然後打開非常低的熱量。
步驟8：攪拌25-30分鐘，或直至厚而淺金色。
步驟9：允許冷卻。
步驟10：用大湯匙吃。

en: Goldilocks Chia Seed Porridge could be just the gluten free, dairy free, paleolithic, and lacto ovo vegetarian recipe you've been looking for.
For $2.63 per serving, you get a breakfast that serves 1.
One portion of this dish contains around 13g of protein, 26g of fat, and a total of 387 calories.

Head to the store and pick up sesame seeds, mango, chia seeds, and a few other things to make it today.

4 people found this recipe to be scrumptious and satisfying.
Overall, this recipe earns a super spoonacular score of 90%.
Try Goldilocks Chia Seed Porridge, Chia Seed Porridge with Orange & Yogurt, and Raspberry Chia Seed Jam and A Chia Giveaway for similar recipes.
zh: Goldilocks Chia Seed Porridge可能只是您一直在尋找的無麩質，沒有乳製品，舊石器時代和乳糖素食食譜。
每份2.63美元，您可以得到一份提供1的早餐。

前往商店，拿起芝麻，芒果，奇亞種子以及其他一些東西。
從準備到盤子，此食譜大約需要15分鐘。
4個人發現這個食譜令人著迷和令人滿意。
總體而言，此食譜的超級小孢子分數為90％。
嘗試Goldilocks Chia Seed Porridge，Chia Seed Porridge配橙色和酸奶，以及Raspberry Chia Seed Jam和Chia贈品，用於類似食譜。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Lovingly mix all of the ingredient's together in your favorite cereal bowl, let sit for approx. 5 minutes or longer so that the Chia seeds can began to thicken into a gel-like consistency. You may prefer to add the Chia seeds and the hemp milk first to allow for the thickening process to take course before adding the remaining ingredient's, this shall be up to you.
Step 2: Once the cereal is thickened, think happy and enjoy!
zh: 步驟1：將所有成分的所有成分混合在一起，在您最喜歡的穀物碗中，靜置大約。 5分鐘或更長時間，以便Chia種子可以開始變稠成類似凝膠的稠度。您可能更喜歡首先添加Chia種子和大麻牛奶，以便在添加剩餘的成分之前允許加厚過程進行過程，這應取決於您。
步驟2：一旦穀物變稠，就會開心並享受！

This recipe serves 10 and costs 61 cents per serving.
One serving contains 329 calories, 8g of protein, and 16g of fat.

zh: 從頭到尾，布魯克林停電蛋糕大約需要45分鐘。
該食譜提供10份，每份食譜的價格為61美分。
一份含有329卡路里，8克蛋白質和16克脂肪。
沒有很多人真的喜歡這種甜點。
使這種食譜如此美味的食譜所需的所有東西都需要發酵粉，水，玉米糖漿和其他少量成分的混合物。
6個人發現這個食譜令人吃驚和令人滿意。
它是由Goodista帶給您的。
考慮到所有因素，此食譜的勺子得分為37％，這是相當糟糕的。
類似的食譜包括新的布魯克林停電蛋糕，布魯克林停電蛋糕和布魯克林停電蛋糕食譜。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees.
Step 2: Butter and flour 2 (9-inch) cake pans. Cut 2 circles of parchment paper or waxed paper to fit the bottoms of the pans, then press them in.
Step 3: In a mixer, cream the butter and shortening together. Add the sugar and mix until light and fluffy.
Step 4: Add the eggs one by one, mixing after each addition.
Step 5: Add the vanilla, cocoa, baking powder, baking soda, and salt and mix.
Step 6: Then add, alternating, about 1/3 of the cake flour, then about 1/3 of the milk until finished.
Step 7: Pour into the prepared pans and bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until a tester inserted into the center comes out clean,
Step 8: Let cool in the pan for 15 minutes, then turn out onto wire racks and let cool completely, to room temperature.
Step 9: Using a long serrated knife, cut the cake layers in half horizontally. Reserving 3 halves for the cake, put the remaining half in a food processor, breaking it up with your hands. Pulse into fine crumbs.
Step 10: Filling: Pour 2 1/2 cups of the water, the sugar, corn syrup and cocoa powder into a large non-reactive saucepan and bring to a boil over medium-high heat, whisking occasionally.
Step 11: Meanwhile, in a small bowl, whisk the remaining 1/2 cup of water and the cornstarch.
Step 12: Whisk into the cocoa mixture in the saucepan and return the mixture to a boil, whisking constantly until very thick, 3 to 4 minutes.
Step 13: Remove from the heat and stir in the butter and vanilla.
Step 14: Pour into a bowl. Cover with plastic wrap, lightly pressing the plastic against the surface to prevent a skin from forming. Chill until firm, about 45 minutes.
Step 15: To finish the cake, place a cake layer on a cake plate or serving platter (reserving the most even layer for the top) and spread with cooled custard. Top with another layer of cake, then custard, then the final layer of cake. Cover the top and sides of the cake with the remaining custard. Coat the cake with the cake crumbs. Chill until ready to serve, at least 2 hours.
zh: 步驟1：將烤箱預熱至375度。
步驟2：黃油和麵粉2（9英寸）蛋糕盤。切2個羊皮紙或打蠟紙，以適合平底鍋的底部，然後將其壓入。
步驟3：在混合器中，將黃油奶油奶油並縮短。加入糖並混合直至輕巧蓬鬆。
步驟4：一一添加雞蛋，每次添加後混合。
步驟5：加入香草，可可粉，發酵粉，小蘇打和鹽，然後混合。
步驟6：然後添加，交替，約1/3的蛋糕粉，然後大約1/3牛奶直至完成。
步驟7：倒入準備好的鍋中，烘烤30至35分鐘，或直到插入中心的測試人員乾淨為止，
步驟8：在鍋中冷卻15分鐘，然後將電線架上旋轉到室溫，然後完全冷卻到室溫。
步驟9：使用長長的鋸齒刀將蛋糕層水平切成兩半。預訂蛋糕的三半，將剩餘的一半放在食品加工機中，用手將其分解。脈衝成細麵包屑。
步驟10：填充：倒入2 1/2杯水，糖，玉米糖漿和可可粉中，將其倒入大型的無反應鍋中，並用中火煮沸，偶爾攪拌。
步驟11：與此同時，在一個小碗中，將剩餘的1/2杯水和玉米澱粉攪拌。
步驟12：攪拌鍋中的可可混合物，然後將混合物煮沸，不斷攪拌直至非常厚，3至4分鐘。
步驟13：從火上取出，然後加入黃油和香草。
步驟14：倒入碗中。用塑料包裹覆蓋，將塑料輕輕按在表面上，以防止皮膚形成。冷卻直到牢固，大約45分鐘。
步驟15：要完成蛋糕，請將蛋糕層放在蛋糕盤或盤子上（將頂部保留最均勻的層），然後用冷卻的蛋ust散佈。再加上另一層蛋糕，然後是蛋ust，然後是最後一層的蛋糕。用剩餘的蛋ust覆蓋蛋糕的頂部和側面。用蛋糕麵包屑塗上蛋糕。冷卻至至少2個小時。

title.en: One Soup, Two Ways: Chunky Vegetables and Cream Of Vegetables
title.zh: 一種湯，兩種方法：矮胖的蔬菜和蔬菜奶油

en: The recipe One Soup, Two Ways: Chunky Vegetables and Cream Of Vegetables can be made in around 45 minutes.
This gluten free and lacto ovo vegetarian recipe serves 6 and costs $1.13 per serving.
This hor d'oeuvre has 167 calories, 7g of protein, and 4g of fat per serving.
It will be a hit at your Autumn event.
2 people were glad they tried this recipe.
A mixture of beans, cooking cream, carrots, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so tasty.
It is brought to you by Foodista.
With a spoonacular score of 57%, this dish is solid.

If you like this recipe, you might also like recipes such as One Soup, Two Ways: Chunky Vegetables and Cream Of Vegetables, Chunky Vegetables with Fusilli, and Chunky pasta sauce with more vegetables than meat.
zh: 食譜一湯，兩種方法：厚實的蔬菜和蔬菜奶油可以在45分鐘內製成。
這種無麩質和乳酸乳素食食譜可提供6份，每份供應$ 1.13。
這種作品具有167卡路里的熱量，7克蛋白質和每份脂肪的4g脂肪。
在您的秋季活動中，這將是一個受歡迎的事情。
2人很高興他們嘗試了這個食譜。
使這種食譜如此美味的全部需要豆類，烹飪霜，胡蘿蔔和其他成分的混合物。
它是由Goodista帶給您的。
這道菜的孢子分數為57％。
如果您喜歡這種食譜，您可能還喜歡一種食譜，例如一種湯，兩種方法：厚實的蔬菜和蔬菜奶油，矮胖的蔬菜，帶有fusilli的蔬菜和厚實的意大利麵醬，蔬菜蔬菜多於肉。

instructions.en:
Step 1: For chunky vegetable soup: Heat olive oil over medium low heat in a soup pot (big enough to hold everything you have) and throw in garlic, onions, carrots and celery.
Step 2: Stir around a bit, add the salt and cover.
Step 3: Let sweat for about 10 minutes.
Step 4: Add the tomato puree and corn, stir, let cook for a few minutes.
Step 5: Then add the broth, turn heat up to maximum and bring to a boil.
Step 6: Add the beans.
Step 7: Season with dried herbs.
Step 8: For the Cream of Vegetables: Transfer half of the chunky soup into another soup pot.
Step 9: Whiz everything up with a hand-held blender, or in a blender.
Step 10: Then use a sieve, and "filter" the soup.
Step 11: Bring back to a boil, add cream, turmeric, curry powder, cayenne pepper and stir well.
zh: 步驟1：對於厚實的蔬菜湯：用中低火在湯鍋中加熱橄欖油（足夠大以容納您擁有的一切），然後放入大蒜，洋蔥，胡蘿蔔和芹菜。
步驟2：攪拌一下，加入鹽和蓋子。
步驟3：讓汗水大約10分鐘。
步驟4：加入番茄泥和玉米，攪拌，煮幾分鐘。
步驟5：然後加入肉湯，將加熱加熱至最大，然後煮沸。
步驟6：添加豆。
步驟7：用乾草藥調味。
第8步：對於蔬菜的奶油：將一半厚實的湯轉移到另一個湯鍋中。
步驟9：用手持式攪拌機或攪拌機中的所有內容。
步驟10：然後使用篩子，然後“過濾”湯。
步驟11：煮沸，加入奶油，薑黃，咖哩粉，辣椒辣椒，然後攪拌均勻。

title.en: Apple Custard Pie With Oatmeal Crust

instructions.en:
Step 1: Preheat Oven 350 degrees:
Step 2: In a food processor combine oats, flour, cinnamon and brown sugar and give a few good chops until oats are ground.
Step 3: In a bowl combine butter and add mixture from the food processor and mix until dough is crumbly.
Step 4: Butter the bottom of a pie plate and press the dough to the bottom and sides. Place pan in the oven and bake 15 minutes or until crust is slightly golden.
Step 5: For the filling beat together eggs, cup sugar and vanilla. Beat in the milk until smooth.
Step 6: Arrange the apple wedges on the bottom of the crust and pour the filling into the crust. Sprinkle the combined topping on the pie and return to the oven for another 30-40 minutes, or until the filling is set.
zh: 步驟1：預熱烤箱350度：

步驟4：在餡餅板的底部黃油，然後將麵團壓到底部和側面。將鍋放在烤箱中，烘烤15分鐘，或直到外殼略微金色。
步驟5：填充雞蛋，杯子和香草。打在牛奶中直至光滑。
步驟6：將蘋果楔子放在地殼的底部，然後將餡料倒入地殼中。在餡餅上撒上合併的澆頭，然後再返回烤箱30-40分鐘，或者直到設置填充物為止。

instructions.en:
Step 1: In shallow baking dish, combine teriyaki sauce and water; add chicken pieces, coating well. Cover and refrigerate two hours. Drain marinade from chicken pieces. In large skillet or wok, heat oil; stir-fry chicken and onion until chicken is slightly browned. Stir in vegetables, ginger, and wine. Cover; simmer 4 to 5 minutes, or until vegetables are tender crisp. In small bowl, combine cornstarch and water until smooth.
Step 2: Gradually add to skillet, stirring constantly, until thickened. Serve over hot rice.
Step 3: *Or use 1 package (16 ounces) frozen vegetable mixture of your choice.

zh: 步驟1：在淺烤盤中，將照燒醬和水混合；加入雞塊，塗覆良好。覆蓋並冷藏兩個小時。從雞塊上排幹醃料。在大煎鍋或炒鍋中，加熱油；攪拌雞肉和洋蔥，直到雞肉略帶褐色。攪拌蔬菜，生薑和葡萄酒。覆蓋;小火煮4至5分鐘，或直到蔬菜變嫩為止。在小碗中，將玉米澱粉和水混合直至光滑。
步驟2：逐漸添加到煎鍋中，不斷攪拌，直至變稠。食用熱米飯。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 350. Melt 6 tbsp. butter in a medium saucepan over low heat. Add flour and cook, stirring constantly, for about 4 minutes.
Step 2: Stir in cayenne and season to taste with salt and pepper. Whisk in hot milk, 1/2 cup at a time, and cook, stirring, until sauce thickens. Reduce heat to low and stir in 2 cups of cheese. Cook, stirring, until cheese melts, about 2 minutes.
Step 3: Combine pasta and sauce in a large bowl, and season with salt. Sprinkle 1/2 cup cheese over the bottom of a buttered 8" 11" baking dish. Place one-third of the pasta in the baking dish, top with 1/2 cup of cheese, then repeat, layering pasta and cheese, ending with cheese, making three layers in all.
Step 4: Pour cream over assembled macaroni and cheese. Melt remaining butter in a skillet. Add bread crumbs, coat with melted butter, and sprinkle over macaroni and cheese.
Step 5: Bake until crust is golden, about 30 minutes. Allow to rest for 15 minutes before serving.
zh: 步驟1：將烤箱預熱至350。熔體6湯匙。在中型鍋中用低火黃油。加入麵粉並煮，不斷攪拌約4分鐘。
步驟2：攪拌cayenne，然後調味以搭配鹽和胡椒粉調味。一次用熱牛奶攪拌，一次1/2杯，煮，攪拌，直到醬汁變稠。將熱量降低至低溫，然後加入2杯奶酪。煮，攪拌，直到奶酪融化，大約2分鐘。
步驟3：將麵食和醬汁混合在一個大碗中，然後加鹽調味。將1/2杯奶酪撒在黃油8“ 11”烤盤的底部。將麵食的三分之一放在烤盤中，上面放上1/2杯奶酪，然後重複，分層意大利面和奶酪，以奶酪結尾，總共製作三層。
步驟4：將奶油倒在裝配的通心粉和奶酪上。在煎鍋中融化剩餘的黃油。加入麵包屑，塗上融化的黃油，然後撒在通心粉和奶酪上。
步驟5：烘烤直到地殼變成金黃色，大約30分鐘。上菜前允許休息15分鐘。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Prepare the banana the night before.
Step 2: Peel, slice, and place on a small parchment lined tray.
Step 3: Pop into the freezer.The same can be done with the mango, but I used frozen mango pieces for convenience.Toss all of the ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth, adding more water if necessary.
Step 4: If you like, add some freshly squeezed orange juice for a citrusy flavour.Serve cold.
zh: 步驟1：前一天晚上準備香蕉。
步驟2：剝皮，切片並放在襯裡的小羊皮紙上。
步驟3：彈出冰箱。芒果可以完成，但是我使用冷凍的芒果零件為方便起見。將所有成分放入攪拌機中並攪拌直至光滑，如有必要，請增加更多的水。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Fry bacon until crisp, crumble and set aside.
Step 2: Peel and devein shrimp.
Step 3: Grill shrimp on a skewer for 2-3 minutes on each side or until pink. Alternatively, fry shrimp over medium heat, a few minutes per side until pink (about 5-8 minutes total).
Step 4: Saute garlic in 1 tbsp butter.
Step 5: Bring water to boil, add grits.
Step 6: Stir and cover for 5 minutes then turn heat to low.
Step 7: Stir in cheese, remaining butter, garlic, and salt.
Step 8: Toss shrimp in barbecue sauce.
Step 9: Layer grits, shrimp, bacon, and scallions in a bowl and serve piping hot.
Step 10: Top with additional barbecue sauce if desired.
zh: 步驟1：炸培根直到酥脆，崩潰並放在一旁。
步驟2：Peel和Devein Shrimp。
步驟3：在串上烤蝦在兩側或直到粉紅色。或者，用中火炸蝦，每側幾分鐘直至粉紅色（總計約5-8分鐘）。
步驟4：用1湯匙黃油炒大蒜。
步驟5：煮沸，加砂。
步驟6：攪拌並蓋上5分鐘，然後將熱量變為低。
步驟7：攪拌奶酪，剩餘的黃油，大蒜和鹽。
步驟8：將蝦扔進燒烤醬中。
步驟9：碗中的砂粒，蝦，培根和蔥，並加熱管道。

instructions.en:
Step 1: 1. Cook chicken breasts (I sauteed mine with a little olive oil and salt and pepper) and set aside. Cook pasta while cooking the chicken and set aside.
Step 2: 2. In a sauce pan, melt butter. Add flour and stir in with butter, cook for 1 minute. Whisk in milk, salt and pepper, garlic powder, lemon juice, and wine. Bring to a boil, constantly whisking. Reduce the heat and simmer for about 5 more minutes. Sauce should thicken.
Step 3: 3. In a large saute pan, add pasta, chicken, and any other desired additions. Heat pan on medium heat. Add alfredo sauce and toss with pasta. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and additional salt and pepper (if needed) and serve!
Step 4: Notes: This recipe made more sauce than I really needed, but I liked having extra. This way, you can add as much sauce as you prefer!
zh: 步驟1：1。煮雞胸肉（我用一點橄欖油，鹽和胡椒粉炒了我的乳房），放在一旁。煮雞肉並放在一邊煮意大利面。
步驟2：2。在醬料鍋中，融化黃油。加入麵粉並加黃油攪拌，煮1分鐘。攪拌牛奶，鹽和胡椒粉，大蒜粉，檸檬汁和葡萄酒。煮沸，不斷攪拌。減少熱量並慢火煮約5分鐘。醬汁應該變稠。
步驟3：3。在一個大炒鍋中，加入麵食，雞肉和其他任何所需的添加。中火加熱鍋。加入阿爾弗雷多醬，然後用麵食折騰。撒上帕爾瑪奶酪，額外的鹽和胡椒粉（如果需要），然後食用！
步驟4：注意：此食譜比我真正需要的多種調味料，但我喜歡額外的醬汁。這樣，您可以添加盡可能多的醬汁！

instructions.en:
Step 1: Mix cake flour, baking powder and salt together. I don't like nutmeg so much, but if you do add it now! Set aside.
Step 2: In your mixer, blend the Shortening (I used plain Crisco) and sugar together on low speed until "sandy".
Step 3: Now blend in the egg yolks on low speed about 1 minute.
Step 4: Alternate mixing in your dry ingredients (the flour combo) and the sour cream. Be sure to scrape down the sides every now and then too.
Step 5: Add the vanilla extract last and mix until incorporated.
Step 6: Cover the batter and let sit in the fridge for 15-20 minutes.
Step 7: Preheat your oven to 350. Spoon your batter into a ziplock bag to use the corner as a piping bag. It's a lot easier this way I promise! Pipe dough into a greased donut pan.
Step 8: Bake for 10-12 minutes.
Step 9: While baking, prepare the icing for the donuts. In a saucepan over low heat warm the milk and then whisk in the confectioners sugar until smooth. That's it!
Step 10: Dip the slightly cool donuts in the icing or spoon icing over the top, whatever works for you.
Step 11: Now to go completely wild, cut the donut in half (like an english muffin). Slice up some strawberries and add some whip cream.
Step 12: Pure bliss.
Step 13: These donuts are super light and airy. The strawberries and whip cream just go perfectly, it's borderline life changing.
zh: 步驟1：將蛋糕粉，發酵粉和鹽混合在一起。我不太喜歡肉荳蔻，但是如果您現在添加它！放在一邊。
步驟2：在您的攪拌機中，將縮短（我使用普通的crisco）和低速糖混合在一起，直到“桑迪”。
步驟3：現在低速攪拌蛋黃。
步驟4：乾燥成分（麵粉組合）和酸奶油中的替代混合。請確保時不時地刮下兩側。
步驟5：最後添加香草提取物並混合直至合併。
步驟6：蓋住麵糊，靜置在冰箱中15-20分鐘。
步驟7：將烤箱預熱至350。將麵糊倒入拉鍊袋中，將角袋用作管道袋。我保證的方式要容易得多！將麵團送入塗有油脂的甜甜圈鍋中。
步驟8：烘烤10-12分鐘。
步驟9：烘烤時，為甜甜圈準備糖霜。在平底鍋中，低熱量加熱牛奶，然後在糖果糖中攪拌直至光滑。就是這樣！
步驟10：將略帶涼爽的甜甜圈浸入糖衣或湯匙糖霜上，無論對您有用什麼。
步驟11：現在要完全瘋狂，將甜甜圈切成兩半（像英式鬆餅一樣）。切一些草莓，加入一些鞭子奶油。
步驟12：純幸福。
步驟13：這些甜甜圈超級輕巧。草莓和鞭子奶油的變化很好，它的生活改變了。

instructions.en:

Step 2: Heat a large frying pan with a drizzle of olive oil and add the peppers. Add the onions, garlic and parsley and let this saut for a few minutes while slicing the sausages lengthwise. Add the sausages to the peppers along with the tablespoons of salsa and toss.
Step 3: Add the dashes of salt and pepper to taste.
zh: 步驟1：在烤箱中烘烤香腸，放在一旁。
步驟2：用細雨的橄欖油加熱一個大煎鍋，然後加入辣椒。添加洋蔥，大蒜和歐芹，讓該炒幾分鐘，同時將香腸切成薄片。將香腸與莎莎醬和折騰的湯匙一起加入辣椒。
步驟3：加入鹽和胡椒粉的10t味。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Put the mascarpone, vanilla, Kahla and a little less than 1/2 of coffee in a medium mixing bowl, blend until everything is smoothly mixed together.
Step 2: In another medium bowl, beat the cream with the icing sugar until smooth, then fold in the mascarpone mix.
Step 3: Place the remaining coffee into large deep plate, quickly dip the biscuits flipping sides, one by one, enough to make one layer in a 11x7 casserole dish.
Step 4: Spread evenly half of the mascarpone mix on top.
Step 5: Repeat with another layer of biscuits and the rest of the mascarpone mix.
Step 6: Refrigerate.
Step 7: Before serving, fill a small sieve with cocoa powder and lightly dust the top.
Step 8: If you are fancy, grate some of bittersweet chocolate or make chocolate curls and scatter them all over
zh: 步驟1：將Mascarpone，Vanilla，Kahla和中等攪拌碗中的咖啡少於1/2少於1/2，融合在一起，直到一切都混合在一起。
步驟2：在另一個中等大小的碗中，用糖霜糖打成奶油，直到光滑，然後折疊成馬斯卡彭混合物。
步驟3：將剩餘的咖啡放入大盤子中，將餅乾迅速浸入一側翻轉的側面，足以在11x7砂鍋中製成一層。
步驟4：將Mascarpone混合物的一半均勻地撒在頂部。
步驟5：與另一層餅乾和其餘的Mascarpone混合物重複。
步驟6：冷藏。
步驟7：食用前，用可可粉填充小篩子，然後將頂部輕輕撒上灰塵。
步驟8：如果您喜歡，請磨碎一些苦樂參半的巧克力或製作巧克力捲髮並將其撒在

title.en: Balsamic & Honey Glazed Salmon with Lemony Asparagus
title.zh: 香脂和蜂蜜釉面鮭魚與檸檬蘆筍

en: If you want to add more gluten free, dairy free, and pescatarian recipes to your recipe box, Balsamic & Honey Glazed Salmon with Lemony Asparagus might be a recipe you should try.

zh: 如果您想在食譜盒中添加更多的無麩質，免費乳製品和pescatarian食譜，香脂和蜂蜜釉面鮭魚與檸檬蘆筍可能是您應該嘗試的食譜。
每份$ 4.44美元，此食譜涵蓋了您對維生素和礦物質的每日需求的26％。
這道菜的一部分含有大約25克蛋白質，14克脂肪和總共301卡路里。
此食譜提供2。

前往商店，拿起檸檬汁，香草，鮭魚片以及其他一些東西。
考慮到所有因素，該食譜的勺子得分為96％，這很棒。
如果您喜歡此食譜，請看一下這些類似的食譜：香脂和蜂蜜釉面鮭魚與檸檬蘆筍，香脂和蜂蜜釉面鮭魚配檸檬蘆筍，以及香脂和蜂蜜釉面鮭魚與檸檬味蘆筍。

instructions.en:
Step 1: In a small mixing bowl or blender, combine all of the ingredients for the balsamic marinade except for the lemon juice (balsamic vinegar, apple cider vinegar, 1 tbsp grapeseed oil, honey, dried dill, herbs de provence, salt and pepper).
Step 2: Whisk or blend until oil and vinegar are well incorporated and no longer separate.
Step 3: Place salmon fillet in a baking dish (I use a small casserole dish). Pour the marinade over the salmon and allow it to marinate for at least 15 minutes (or up to 24 hours covered in the refrigerator).
Step 4: Turn your oven on high broil.
Step 5: Just before putting the salmon in the oven, drizzle the lemon juice over the fish.
Step 6: Bake for 10 to 12 minutes on the top rack or until salmon is glazed, browned and sizzling.
Step 7: While the salmon is baking, prepare the asparagus.
Step 8: Wash the asparagus and cut off the bottom inch and a half of each stalk and discard.
Step 9: Spread the asparagus on in a large skillet. Drizzle the grapeseed oil over the asparagus and spread the oil on the asparagus with your hands so that all stalks are completely coated.
Step 10: Sprinkle asparagus with desired amount of salt and pepper.
Step 11: Saute over medium heat for 5 minutes.
Step 12: Add the two tablespoons of vegetable stock and cover the skillet.
Step 13: Saute 4 minutes.
Step 14: Remove lid and add the minced garlic.
Step 15: Place cover back over the asparagus.
Step 16: Continue cooking an additional 3 to 5 minutes until asparagus is cooked but not too soft. Grate lemon zest over the top of the asparagus.
zh: 步驟1：在一個小的攪拌碗或攪拌機中，除了檸檬汁（香醋，蘋果醋，1湯匙葡萄籽油，蜂蜜，蜂蜜，幹蒔蘿，香草de provence，salt and Pepper）之外，將所有香脂醃料的所有成分混合在一起。
步驟2：攪拌或混合，直到油和醋被充分摻入並且不再分開。
步驟3：將鮭魚片放入烤盤中（我用小砂鍋菜）。將醃泡汁倒在鮭魚上，並允許其醃製至少15分鐘（或在冰箱中覆蓋24小時）。
步驟4：將烤箱打開高烤。
步驟5：就在將鮭魚放在烤箱中之前，將檸檬汁淋上魚。
步驟6：在頂部架子上烘烤10到12分鐘，或直到鮭魚被釉面，褐色和嘶嘶作響。
步驟7：鮭魚烘烤時，準備蘆筍。
步驟8：洗蘆筍，切斷每個莖的底部半英寸半，然後丟棄。
步驟9：將蘆筍撒在大煎鍋中。將葡萄籽油淋在蘆筍上，並用手將油撒在蘆筍上，以使所有莖都完全覆蓋。
步驟10：撒上所需量的鹽和胡椒粉。
步驟11：用中火炒5分鐘。
步驟12：添加兩湯匙蔬菜湯，並覆蓋煎鍋。
步驟13：炒4分鐘。
步驟14：取下蓋子，加入碎大蒜。
步驟15：將蓋子放回蘆筍上。
步驟16：繼續烹飪3至5分鐘，直到蘆筍煮熟，但不要太軟。烤檸檬皮在蘆筍的頂部。

title.zh: 巧克力過夜燕麥和草莓

這份早餐有217卡路里的熱量，15克蛋白質和每份脂肪5克。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Mix all the ingredients, except for the strawberries.
Step 2: Place a bit of the oatmeal batter into a jar or other airtight container. Add slices of strawberries on top. Add another layer of oatmeal batter and strawberries. Top with the remaining oatmeal batter.
Step 3: Put it in the refrigerator overnight.
Step 4: Enjoy!
zh: 步驟1：混合所有成分，除草莓外。
步驟2：將一些燕麥麵糊放入罐子或其他密封容器中。在頂部加入草莓。加入另一層燕麥麵糊和草莓。頂部剩下的燕麥麵糊。
步驟3：將其放入冰箱過夜。
步驟4：享受！

zh: 如果您在廚房裡有大約45分鐘的時間，芝士蛋糕冰淇淋與芒果糖漿可能是一種壯觀的無麩質，可以嘗試使用乳糖和乳糖素食食譜。

2008年冰淇淋大賽參賽作品，愛國冰淇淋三明治，紅色天鵝絨脆餅星和芝士蛋糕冰淇淋，以及櫻桃芝士蛋糕冰淇淋最好的舔！
2008年冰淇淋孔適合類似食譜。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Add the first 6 ingredients to a two litre plastic jug. Use a stick blender to thoroughly mix the ingredients and fluff the mixture up.d:
Step 2: Place the jug in the freezer and freeze until the mixture starts to set.
Step 3: Use the stick blender to mix the ice-cream again for about 30 seconds. Return the mix to the freezer.
Step 4: Repeat this step again as the ice-cream is setting.
Step 5: Once the mixture has been re-mixed twice, transfer the ice-cream to a deep metal dish and return to the freezer. Choose a dish which is large enough and has enough space to use the stick blender.
Step 6: Blend in the metal container twice before allowing to completely freeze.
Step 7: Place all the mango syrup ingredients in a saucepan and using a stick blender puree the mix.
Step 8: Heat the syrup and let it boil for 5 minutes stirring regularly.
Step 9: Reduce the heat slightly and stir for a further two minutes or until the mixture is at a desirable syrup consistently. It will thicken slightly on cooling.
Step 10: Pour the cooled syrup over the ice-cream for a delicious Mango Cheesecake Ice-Cream.
zh: 步驟1：將前6個成分添加到兩升塑料壺中。使用棒攪拌器徹底混合成分並將混合物弄髒。 D：
步驟2：將水罐放在冰箱中並冷凍，直到混合物開始凝固。
步驟3：使用棒攪拌器再次將冰淇淋混合約30秒。將混合物退回冰箱。
步驟4：在冰淇淋設置時再次重複此步驟。
步驟5：一旦將混合物重新混合了兩次，將冰淇淋轉移到深金屬菜餚中，然後返回冰箱。選擇足夠大的菜，並有足夠的空間使用棒攪拌器。
步驟6：在允許完全凍結之前兩次混合金屬容器。
步驟7：將所有芒果糖漿成分放在鍋中，然後使用棒攪拌器將混合物混合在一起。
步驟8：加熱糖漿，煮沸5分鐘定期攪拌。
步驟9：稍微減少熱量，再攪拌兩分鐘，或直到混合物保​​​​持理想的糖漿。冷卻時會稍微變厚。
步驟10：將冷卻的糖漿倒在冰淇淋上，以獲得美味的芒果芝士蛋糕冰淇淋。

zh: 巧克力蘆筍邦特蛋糕可能只是您正在尋找的甜點。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 F.
Step 2: In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking soda, cinnamon, cocoa powder, and salt.
Step 3: Add oil, eggs, asparagus, orange peel and vanilla; mix well.
Step 4: Fold in pecans.
Step 5: Pour into a greased and floured 10-in. bundt pan. Bake for 1 hour or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes; remove from pan to a wire rack to cool completely.
zh: 步驟1：將烤箱預熱至350F。
步驟2：在一個大碗中，將麵粉，糖，小蘇打，肉桂，可可粉和鹽混合在一起。
步驟3：加油，雞蛋，蘆筍，橙皮和香草；混合好。
步驟4：折疊山核桃。
步驟5：倒入塗有油脂的麵粉10英寸。邦特鍋。烘烤1小時，或直到插入牙籤乾淨為止。冷卻10分鐘；從鍋中卸下到電線架以完全冷卻。

instructions.en:
Step 1: First up, youll melt 1 tablespoon of the butter over medium heat and add in the garlic, onion, celery, mushrooms and a pinch of salt and pepper. Cook it all up for 3 to 4 minutes.
Step 2: Once the veggies are cooked and hot, pull them out of your pan, turn the heat down to medium low and add in the remaining 4 tbsp of butter. Once its good and melted, add in 1/4 cup of flour and combine it to make a roux.
Step 3: To your roux, add in the milk, sherry, and broth. Combine it well and bring it to a boil until thick.
Step 4: Once it thickens, turn the heat down to low and add the veggies back in along with your tuna, peas, and pimientos.
Step 5: Stir it all together and add in your cooked noodles. Pour the whole concoction into an oven safe dish and top it off with the bread crumbs and cheese. Sprinkle a little parsley over the top to make it all pretty.
Step 6: Throw it in your oven preheated to 350 degrees for about 20 minutes or until the cheese is bubbling and golden.
zh: 步驟1：首先，您將用中火融化1湯匙黃油，然後加入大蒜，洋蔥，芹菜，蘑菇和少許鹽和胡椒粉。將其全部煮3至4分鐘。
步驟2：蔬菜煮熟並加熱後，將其從鍋中拉出，將熱量降低至中低點，然後加入剩餘的4湯匙黃油。一旦融化並融化，加入1/4杯麵粉並將其混合以製作roux。
步驟3：到您的roux，加入牛奶，雪利酒和​​​​肉湯。將其混合得很好，將其煮沸直至厚。
步驟4：一旦變厚，將熱量調低至低，然後將蔬菜與金槍魚，豌豆和折疊醬一起加入。
步驟5：將它們全部攪拌在一起，然後加入煮熟的麵條。將整個混合物倒入烤箱安全的菜餚中，然後用麵包屑和奶酪將其倒出。在頂部撒上一點歐芹，使一切都很漂亮。
步驟6：將其預熱至350度的烤箱中約20分鐘，或直到奶酪冒泡和金色。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Preheat the oven to 325F (170C). Butter 6 individual ramekins or pyrex bowls.
Step 2: Remove and set aside 2 Tbs of the sugar.
Step 3: Separate the eggs: place the yolks in a large mixing bowl and the whites place in a separate bowl preferably plastic or metal.
Step 4: Cream the butter with the rest of the sugar (1 cup less the 2 Tbs) until blended and fluffy.
Step 5: Beat in the yolks, one at a time, beating after each addition until blended.
Step 6: Beat in the vanilla and the lemon zest.
Step 7: Add the flour and the salt and beat just until combined.
Step 8: With the mixer on low, beat in the milk and the lemon juice. It will be very liquid.
Step 9: In the separate bowl with very clean beaters, beat the egg whites with the cream of tartar until foamy and then until soft peaks form.
Step 10: Continue beating the whites as you gradually add the 2 tablespoons sugar. Beat until stiff peaks form.
Step 11: Fold the whites into the yolk/lemon batter just until incorporated and you have no more chunks of whites.
Step 12: Using a ladle, fill the 6 ramekins with the batter almost to the top.
Step 13: Place the filled ramekins in a large baking pan (placing a piece of newspaper on the bottom of the pan keeps the water of the water bath from boiling) and very carefully (so as not to get any water in the lemon batter) fill the pan with hot water, so that the water is halfway up the ramekins. If you like, place the baking pan in the oven and then pour in the water; this will avoid you having to lift and move the baking pan after it is filled and risk splashing the water into the batter.
Step 14: Bake for 40 45 minutes. The tops will be puffed up, maybe to 1 inch (1 2 cm) above the rim of the ramekins, and a deep golden brown.
Step 15: Remove the baking pan from the oven then carefully remove the ramekins from the water bath onto a kitchen towel.
Step 16: Allow to cool slightly before serving. Like a souffl, the tops will sink a bit when cooling.
Step 17: Serve hot or warm they can be eaten later but are best when fresh from the oven or just slightly cooled with a sprinkling of powdered sugar or a dollop of whipped cream.
zh: 步驟1：將烤箱預熱至325F（170C）。黃油6個單獨的小動物或pyrex碗。
步驟2：取出並擱置2湯匙糖。
步驟3：將雞蛋分開：將蛋黃放在一個大的攪拌碗中，然後將白色放在單獨的碗中，最好是塑料或金屬。
步驟4：用其餘的糖（1杯少2湯匙）奶油黃油奶油，直到混合併蓬鬆。
步驟5：一次跳動蛋黃，每次添加後均跳動直到混合。
步驟6：在香草和檸檬皮中擊敗。
步驟7：加入麵粉和鹽，然後攪拌直至合併。
步驟8：將混合器降低後，用牛奶和檸檬汁跳動。它將是非常液體的。
步驟9：在單獨的碗中，用非常乾淨的攪拌器，用牙垢奶油攪打蛋清直至泡沫狀，然後直至形成柔軟的峰。
步驟10：逐漸添加2湯匙糖時，繼續擊敗白人。擊打直到形成僵硬的峰值。
步驟11：將白色折疊到蛋黃/檸檬麵糊中，直到合併為止，您將沒有更多的白色。
步驟12：使用鋼包，將6個小動物填充到頂部。
步驟13：將填充的小模子放在一個大烤盤中（將一塊報紙放在鍋底上，使水浴的水保持沸騰），非常小心（以免在檸檬麵糊中獲取任何水），以使鍋裡的水充滿了熱水，因此水將水在Ramekins的一半上。如果願意，將烤盤放在烤箱中，然後倒入水中；這將避免您在烤盤填充後不得不舉起並移動烤盤，並冒著將水濺入麵糊的風險。
步驟14：烘烤40 45分鐘。頂部將膨脹，大概在小模子的邊緣上方1英寸（1 2厘米）和深金棕色。
步驟15：從烤箱中取出烤盤，然後小心地將小動物從水浴中取出到廚房毛巾上。
步驟16：食用前稍微冷卻。像蛋黃一樣，冷卻時頂部會下沉一點。
步驟17：供應熱或溫暖，可以在以後食用，但最好是在烤箱中新鮮時最好的食用，或者只是撒上撒上糖粉或一團鮮奶油。

instructions.en:
Step 1: Combine all of the ingredients for the garlic oil. Heat 1 tablespoon of the garlic oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat. When garlic begins to sizzle and smell fragrant, add the diced tomatoes and their liquid. Bring to a simmer, and simmer for about 10 minutes, until thickened slightly, breaking up the tomatoes a bit with a wooden spoon. Add the olives and basil. Season with salt & pepper to taste, set aside.
Step 2: Preheat your grill for at least 10 minutes. Season the chicken with salt & pepper and toss with 2 tablespoons of the garlic oil. Brush the eggplant with 2 more tablespoons of the garlic oil. Split the hoagie rolls open and brush with the remaining 2 tablespoons of garlic oil.
Step 3: Scrape clean and oil the grill grate (using a wad of paper towel dipped in oil). Add the eggplant and cook until tender about 5-7 minutes per side, turning once, remove eggplant from the grill and cover with foil while grilling the chicken. Add the chicken and grill until cooked through, about 4-5 minutes per side, adding the cheese for about the last 30 seconds to a minute. Remove chicken from the grill. Add the hoagie rolls, cut side down and grill until toasted.
Step 4: To assemble the sandwiches, layer some of the eggplant on the toasted roll, topped with a little of the sauce then some of the chicken and additional sauce.
zh: 步驟1：將大蒜油的所有成分結合在一起。用中火加熱1湯匙大蒜油。當大蒜開始發紅並聞起來香氣時，加入切成丁的西紅柿及其液體。煮沸，小火煮約10分鐘，直到略微變稠，用木勺將西紅柿稍微分解。加入橄欖和羅勒。用鹽和胡椒粉調味，放在一邊。
步驟2：將烤架預熱至少10分鐘。用鹽和胡椒粉調味雞肉，然後用2湯匙大蒜油拌勻。用2湯匙大蒜油刷茄子。將Hoagie滾動打開，並用剩餘的2湯匙大蒜油刷。
步驟3：刮擦烤架（使用浸入油中的一塊紙巾）。加入茄子，煮至每側約5-7分鐘，轉動一次，從烤架上取下茄子，並用箔紙蓋上烤雞。加入雞肉和烤架，直到煮熟，每側約4-5分鐘，將奶酪添加約最後30秒至一分鐘。從烤架上取出雞肉。加入Hoagie卷，切成一面並燒烤直到烤製。
步驟4：要組裝三明治，請將一些茄子舖在烤麵包上，上面放上一些醬汁，然後再加一些雞肉和額外的醬汁。
